data.title: Tristan Thompson
data.meta_description: Tristan Trevor James Thompson (born March 13, 1991) is a Jamaican-Canadian pro basketball player. Khloé was in a romantic relationship with basketball player Tristan Thompson. The couple resided in Cleveland, Ohio. In December 2017, she announced they were expecting their first child...
data.text:
Tristan Trevor James Thompson (born March 13, 1991) is a Jamaican-Canadian pro basketball player.

Relationship with Khloé[]

Khloé was in a romantic relationship with basketball player Tristan Thompson. The couple resided in Cleveland, Ohio. In December 2017, she announced they were expecting their first child together. In March 2018, Kardashian revealed she was expecting a girl

On April 12, 2018, Kardashian gave birth to their daughter, True Thompson. Following controversy after Thompson was found to have cheated on Kardashian they split up but reconciled again a month later.

On March 2019 he was found to have cheated on Khloé again with Kylie's then best friend Jordyn and they finally split up.

On June 21, 2021, he was found cheating on Khloé again with Maralee Nichols with whom he had gotten pregnant with a son named Theo which ultimately led to the couple breaking up.

On July 28, 2022, he and his on-again/off-again girlfriend, Khloé, welcomed their son, Tatum, who resides with his mother in Calabasas, who has full legal custody of him and his sister, True.
